name: You
message: Morning Angelie, I have a question about My Task

name: Angelie Crison
message: Yes sure, Any problem with your assignment?

name: You
message: How to make a responsive display from the dashboard?

name: You
message: Is there a plugin to do this task?

name: Angelie Crison
message: No plugins. You just have to make it smaller according to the size of the phone.

name: Angelie Crison
message: Thank you very much. I'm glad you asked about the assignment.
